resources.string: Hero of the Mushroom Kingdom, famous plumber
Jumps high, can throw fireballs with the Fire Flower, and is known for his speed and agility. He can also transform into Super Mario, Fire Mario, Tanooki Mario, among others
Jumps higher than Mario, but is a bit slower. With the Fire Flower, he can also throw fireballs, and has a special ability to float a bit in the air during his jumps
Can float in the air for short periods thanks to her dress. She is known for her great evasion skills and for using hearts to heal herself in some games
Inhabitant and guardian of the Mushroom Kingdom, assistant to Princess Peach
Very fast and agile. Although he doesn\'t have as good jumping abilities as Mario or Luigi, his speed allows him to be effective in many levels
Companion and loyal friend of Mario
Can eat enemies with his long tongue, run quickly, and jump high. He can also transform into different colors with special abilities
King of the Koopas and arch-nemesis of Mario
Extraordinary strength, can throw fireballs and perform spinning attacks. Known for his great endurance and ability to grow to gigantic sizes
Super strength, great endurance, and can perform a spinning attack. Known for his greed and unconventional skills
Giant gorilla and friend of Mario
Incredible strength and ability to throw barrels. Can perform high jumps and swing on vines
Agility and ability to perform high jumps. Known for her bravery and adventurous spirit
Guardian of the cosmos and mother of the Lumas
Can levitate, control time, and use cosmic magic. Able to manipulate objects and has a special connection with stars and Lumas
Friend of Toad and adventurer of the Mushroom Kingdom
Agility and jumping skills. With a super crown, she can transform into Peachette, gaining abilities similar to Princess Peach
Son of Bowser, always trying to help his father defeat Mario
Can use his magic brush to create obstacles, throw fireballs, and pilot his ship. Agile and also knows how to disguise himself to trick his enemies
